TreasureBox.desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>可被鑰匙打開，產出隨機道具

RandomEgg.name: 彩蛋
RandomEgg.desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>打開產出隨機道具

Clock.name: 鐘錶
Clock.desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>死神後退<font color=#00ff00 size=20>{deathGodBackStep}<font color=#000000 size=20>步

HpCapsule.name: 醫療藥劑
HpCapsule.desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>每回合回復<font color=#00ff00 size=20>{dhp}<font color=#000000 size=20>生命,持續5回合

Magazine.name: 自然雜誌
Magazine.desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>每次點擊獲得1經驗值

Shield.name: 盾牌
Shield.desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>抵擋一次攻擊傷害，冷卻時間3回合

HeadBone.name: 骷髏頭
HeadBone.desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>每當你被怪物突襲時，骷髏王都會原地復活

DeathGod.name: 死神
DeathGod.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>漂浮

<font color=#000000 size=20>每回合都會移動位置;<font color=#3333cc size=20>殺戮 <font color=#3333cc size=20>每回合都會攻擊

NormalZombie.name: 普通僵屍
NormalZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>平淡

<font color=#000000 size=20>沒有特殊能力

GoblinThief.name: 哥布林竊賊
GoblinThief.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>偷竊

<font color=#000000 size=20>突襲時偷取<font color=#00ff00 size=20>{percent}%<font color=#000000 size=20>的金幣

HoundZombie.name: 獵犬僵屍
HoundZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>屍毒

<font color=#000000 size=20>攻擊附帶2層中毒

Vampire.name: 吸血鬼
Vampire.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>吸血

<font color=#000000 size=20>突襲時吸取<font color=#00ff00 size=20>{percent}%<font color=#000000 size=20>的當前生命值

DancerZombie.name: 舞王僵屍
DancerZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>伴舞

<font color=#000000 size=20>突襲時召喚2個同伴

GluttonyZombie.name: 暴食僵屍
GluttonyZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>饕餮

<font color=#000000 size=20>突襲時吞噬1件隨機道具

Gengar.name: 耿鬼
Gengar.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>伏擊

<font color=#000000 size=20>離開本層時，進行一次攻擊

BombAbomination.name: 自爆憎惡
BombAbomination.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>自爆

<font color=#000000 size=20>{cnt}回合後自爆，造成{mult}倍的攻擊傷害

EyeDemon.name: 眼魔
EyeDemon.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>透視

<font color=#000000 size=20>死亡時探索2個空方格

RandomEggZombie.name: 彩蛋僵屍
RandomEggZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>彩蛋

<font color=#000000 size=20>死亡必定掉落彩蛋

LustZombie.name: 色欲僵屍
LustZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>魅惑

<font color=#000000 size=20>突襲時死神提前15回合

CommanderZombie.name: 指揮官僵屍
CommanderZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>統領

<font color=#000000 size=20>在場時其他所有怪物攻擊和生命值翻倍

RageZombie.name: 狂暴僵屍
RageZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>狂暴

<font color=#000000 size=20>生命值越少攻擊力越高

HideZombie.name: 隱匿僵屍
HideZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>隱匿

<font color=#000000 size=20>出現後隨機隱藏到其他空位

BallShito.name: 圆球使徒
BallShito.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>護衛

<font color=#000000 size=20>附近8格中有其他怪物受到攻擊時，承受其傷害

ReviveZombie.name: 複生僵屍
ReviveZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>複生

<font color=#000000 size=20>死亡後可以復活一次

CowardZombie.name: 膽怯僵屍
CowardZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>膽小

<font color=#000000 size=20>若其他僵屍死亡則會逃進陰影

MarkZombie.name: 標記僵屍
MarkZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>招供

<font color=#000000 size=20>每次受到傷害，都會標記一個隨機怪物

GreedyZombie.name: 貪婪僵屍
GreedyZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>貪婪

<font color=#000000 size=20>拾取周圍的道具和金幣

ConfusionZombie.name: 疑惑僵屍
ConfusionZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>混亂

<font color=#000000 size=20>周圍的方格都會顯示成問號

Mummy.name: 木乃伊
Mummy.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>沙塵

<font color=#000000 size=20>在自己身邊製造迷霧

PoisonJellyfish.name: 毒性水母
PoisonJellyfish.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>毒霧

<font color=#000000 size=20>死亡時使所有未揭開的方塊帶毒

SkeletonKing.name: 骷髏王
SkeletonKing.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>不死

<font color=#000000 size=20>每當被其他怪物突襲時復活

SwatheZombie.name: 纏繞僵屍
SwatheZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>纏繞

<font color=#000000 size=20>突襲時鎖定三項已顯形物品，死亡後才可解鎖<font color=#3333cc size=20>劇毒

<font color=#000000 size=20>攻擊附帶2層中毒

BoxMonster.name: 憤怒寶箱
BoxMonster.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>憤怒

<font color=#000000 size=20>寶箱的復仇

ShopNpc.name: 商人
desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Shop

<font color=#000000 size=20>Sell all kinds of props here;<font>

CharmedNormal.desc: <font color=#3333cc size=20>attack monster in its attack range, attack back after being hurt

<font color=#3333cc size=20>explode after 2 rounds

<font color=#3333cc size=20>attack monster in its attack range, attack back after being hurt

EyeDemonCharmed.name: 眼魔
EyeDemonCharmed.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>透視

<font color=#000000 size=20>死亡時探2個空方格

<font color=#3333cc size=20>attack monster in its attack range, attack back after being hurt

HpPotion.name: 血瓶
HpPotion.desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>使用回復<font color=#00ff00 size=20>{dhp}<font color=#000000 size=20>點生命值

SuperPotion.name: 超能藥水
SuperPotion.desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>在<font color=#00ff00 size=20>{immunizeCnt}<font color=#000000 size=20>回合內，不會受到突襲，免疫所有傷害

Apple.name: 蘋果
desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>使用回復<font color=#00ff00 size=20>{dhp}<font color=#000000 size=20>點生命值

Steak.desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>使用回復<font color=#00ff00 size=20>{dhp}<font color=#000000 size=20>點生命值

Knife.name: 小刀
Knife.desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>投擲武器，造成1點傷害

SmallRock.name: 小石头
SmallRock.desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>投擲武器，造成1點傷害

Bazooka.name: 火箭筒
Bazooka.desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>Ignite the target after shooting, dealing <font color=#00ff00 size=20>{power} <font color=#000000 size=20>damage</font>

RayGun.name: 火焰射線
RayGun.desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>射擊後點燃目標，造成3點傷害

Cocoon.name: 繭
Cocoon.desc: <font color=#000000 size=20>被繭包裹的物品無法使用
